title: A confutation of a popishe, and sclaunderous libelle in forme of an apologie: geuen out into the courte, and spread abrode in diuerse other places of the realme. VVritten by VVilliam Fulke, Bacheler in Diuinitie, and felowe of S. Ihons Colledge in Cambridge.
author: Fulke, William, 1538-1589.
publisher: By Ihon Kingston, for William Iones, and are to bee solde at the newe long shop, at the west ende of Poules,
